column4: If you look further down on that page "hands off, preseeded network server install" there's an example for the alternate/server CDs

Thank you, but I cannot see that example. I mean, I can see several sample labels, but I cannot see one for servers. Do you know if in the case of a Jaunty ISO I should use "kernel install/vmlinuz"? The HOWTO suggests "kernel ubuntu-desktop/casper/vmlinuz" but it doesn't exist
casper is only for the desktop images (because casper is the type of image the liveCD is in).  Yes, you're just looking for the vmlinuz thing for the kernel, wherever it happens to be.
